frontmatter.title: Slugify In Python

frontmatter.excerpt: Creating and using the right slug is important. Search engines often check a website's slug when they index pages, and it directly affects the overall performance of SEO.

frontmatter.title: Making Single-Page App in React with Django
frontmatter.author: James
frontmatter.excerpt: Creating a single page app in React is getting easier than the past. There are many readings on blogs, Stackoverflow and Github talking about making a SPA  using React, and it should be sufficient in many cases.
